name: Glugbot
description: A text processing for creative writing, with an API for applications that works with creative writing. Emotional analysis of text on a twenty point scale. Emotionally relevant snippets from songs, poems & quotations. Random feeling words, quotations etc Detect most used words. Detect exotic words. Shuffle text to substitute nouns, adjectives and other parts of speeches. Get rhyming words. Word exploration (via wordnik)
